      • setBoard

        public void setBoard(Level l)
        Sets the board according to Level l.
        Parameters:
        l - The selected level
        Requires
        l.repOK() == true
        Modifies
        GameBoard.getInstance().lokumList
        Ensures
        GameBoard.getInstance().lokumList = l.getInitialBoard()
        this.repOK() == true

      • swapLokums

        public void swapLokums(int x1,
                       int y1,
                       int x2,
                       int y2)
        Swaps the Lokums at (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-coordinate of the first Lokum.
        y1 - The y-coordinate of the first Lokum.
        x2 - The x-coordinate of the second Lokum.
        y2 - The y-coordinate of the second Lokum.
        Requires
        this.repOK() == true
        0 <= x1 < lokumList.length
        0 <= x2 < lokumList.length
        0 <= y1 < lokumList[x1].length
        0 <= y2 < lokumList[x2].length
        (x1 == x2 && y1 == y2) != true
        Modifies
        lokumList[x1][y1]
        lokumList[x2][y2]
        Ensures
        this.repOK() == true

      • deleteAndFill

        public int deleteAndFill()
        Deletes groups of 3 or more Lokums, and fills the places of deleted Lokums. Also creates the SpecialLokums
        Returns:
        Points earned by deleting and filling
        Requires
        this.repOK() == true
        deleteList!=null
        createList!=null
        Modifies
        lokumList
        deleteList
        createList
        Ensures
        this.repOK() == true
        deleteList != null
        createList!=null
        deleteList.size() == 0
        createList.size()==0
